analysis.description:
MarketBase._transferOrderMoney (/unique_contracts/0xb06451f5280ffef60df9d0c867a6663285d68b22.sol#832-840) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _owner.transfer(_price - priceCut) (/unique_contracts/0xb06451f5280ffef60df9d0c867a6663285d68b22.sol#837)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xb06451f5280ffef60df9d0c867a6663285d68b22.sol:
